We have ongoing opportunities to join our team as a flexible part-time team member.  Submit your application now and we’ll reach out to you when the next intake starts.

Utilities.title: Part Time Crew Roles
Utilities.description: We’re constantly striving to serve up a great variety of menu options, and with the introduction of some exciting new features at Macca’s, we’re also serving up a great variety of crew roles.

Utilities.title: HSEQ Consultant - Part-time
Utilities.description:
A future with purpose. How will you shape yours? 
This is an excellent opportunity for a recent graduate or current student looking to launch their in HSEQ.

Utilities.title: Operations and Coordination Officer
Utilities.description: The Zone Operations and Coordination Team (ZOC) are seeking to fill a vacancy within their team with someone who can demonstrate experience in service delivery, customer centricity, and administrative functions.

Utilities.title: Merchandiser - Blacktown/ Greystanes
Utilities.description: Be a part of our high performing team of merchandisers and own Western Sydney! Put your creativity to work to build showstopping displays for our customers!

Utilities.title: Merchandiser (Field Sales) Ipswich Area
Utilities.description: At The Arnott’s Group, you’ll work with a diverse team of who align with our values, are passionate and empowered to perform at pace and achieve big things. We stand for high performance with integrity and find moments of pride and celebrate the wins gained from our collective effort.

Utilities.title: Merchandiser - Ryde
Utilities.description: Join our high performing merchandisers & own Sydney's Inner West! Put your creativity to work building showstopping displays to delight our customers.

Utilities.title: Billing Officer - Finance Operations
Utilities.description: Launch a promising career with our fast-growing company in an industry undergoing rapid transformation. Our Billing Officers are key players in our Finance Operations space ensuring accuracy of invoices received and processed, ensuring a smooth billing process for our customers.

Utilities.title: Customer Service Specialist (IAM)
Utilities.description: Launch a promising career with our fast-growing company in an industry undergoing rapid transformation. The Customer Service team is at the heart of our high-quality service offering with our Customer Service Specialists being the first point of contact for customer enquiries and creative solutions.

Utilities.title: efm Graduate Program - Commencing March 2024
Utilities.description: Kickstart your career with the efm Graduate Program, where you will gain exposure to a variety of business functions and real-world experiences solving operational and customer problems!
